#######################
 Invoice - SomConnexio
#######################

|badge1| |badge2| |badge3|

This module facilitates the invoicing process at SomConnexió by
integrating Odoo with the Som Connexió Data Warehouse (DWH) API. It
enables seamless synchronization of invoice data between the systems.
The module is designed to generate invoices automatically based on
predefined templates and data from the DWH. Invoices are saved and can
be download in PDF format.
